name: MantraOfTheDay
0:
”Alexa, mantra of the day”
”Alexa, open mantra of the day”
”Alexa, ask mantra of the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mantra of the day
des:
Get your Mantra Of The Day right now, right away. Each mantra will help you find the beauty in each day, and at every moment. 

Every morning, ask Alexa to tell you Mantra of the Day and set the tone for your day.

To get mantra of the day:

Say “Alexa, Mantra of the day”, "Alexa Open Mantra of the day" Or "Alexa Ask Mantra of the day"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
